H0.text: In Greek mythology who gave King Midas the power to turn everything he touched into gold. Dionysus

H1.text: In Greek mythology who gave King Midas the power to turn everything he touched into gold. Zeus

H2.text: In Greek mythology who gave King Midas the power to turn everything he touched into gold. Hermes

H3.text: In Greek mythology who gave King Midas the power to turn everything he touched into gold. Lyaeus

A4.text: The god consented, telling Midas to wash in the river Pactolus.
